page.title: 20CRAIGNANT OLD QUARRY
page.content:
A planning application has been made to the local council to use {Craignant old quarry}as a{waste dump.} Local people are very anxious about this proposal. The people we interviewed said the roads were much too narrow and bendy to take heavy goods vehicles. Others were upset about its effect upon the wildlife of the area and the ugly scar it would make on the landscape. Most of the local people have signed a{petition } and sent it to the council strongly objecting to the use of the quarry as a dump.
The collection and analysis of the information contained on this disk has been the work of the junior class {Selattyn C.E School. (Summer 1985) }
